activity_differential: person recording their movement in living room
person exploring room while holding camera
description: A person, visible by their sneakers and trousers, is moving around a living room, at times sitting and at times walking. The camera, likely held by the person, pans and tilts to follow their movement and the environment. Various mats, doormats, tiles, and other inanimate objects are present but not manipulated. The person is briefly seen in a mirror, confirming their animate status and camera control.
